long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop opening the console and tabbing between your editor and browser to edit css! Contextly adds nifty keyboard shortcuts for faster web-development. With a few clicks of the keyboard, change the font, class, or position of elements on your page.

Keyboard short-cuts for the following features: 
* Make elements / classes draggable.
* Choose from handpicked google web fonts to use. Change font styles. 
* Make classes resizable. Drag and pull divs to your desired height or width. 
* Wrap elements in classes. 
* Add elements to divs. 
* Revert any css changes with the press of a button. 

Check out a live demo at www.getcontextly.com
